statements: SELECT player_id, hair_style, hair_color, skin_color, clothing_style FROM player_preferences;
SELECT hair_style, skin_color, clothing_style, hair_color, player_id FROM player_preferences;
SELECT player_id, hair_color, clothing_style, skin_color, hair_style FROM player_preferences;
SELECT hair_color, clothing_style, player_id, skin_color, hair_style FROM player_preferences;
SELECT skin_color, player_id, clothing_style, hair_style, hair_color FROM player_preferences;
SELECT * FROM player_preferences WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, hair_style, clothing_style FROM player_preferences WHERE hair_color = 'Blonde';
SELECT player_id, hair_color FROM player_preferences WHERE skin_color = 'Dark' ORDER BY hair_color DESC;
SELECT player_id, hair_style, skin_color FROM player_preferences WHERE clothing_style LIKE '%T-Shirt%';
SELECT COUNT(player_id) AS player_count, hair_color FROM player_preferences GROUP BY hair_color HAVING player_count > 1;
SELECT * FROM player_preferences;
SELECT character_name, favorite_color FROM player_preferences WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, preferred_weapon FROM player_preferences WHERE favorite_color = 'Blue';
SELECT * FROM customization_options WHERE price < 50.00;
SELECT option_name, option_type FROM customization_options WHERE option_type = 'Skin' ORDER BY option_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM player_preferences WHERE favorite_color = 'Blue';
SELECT character_name, preferred_weapon FROM player_preferences WHERE player_id = 1001;
SELECT player_id, favorite_color FROM player_preferences WHERE preferred_weapon = 'Sword' ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customization_options WHERE option_type = 'Skin' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT player_id, character_name, favorite_color, preferred_weapon FROM player_preferences WHERE favorite_color LIKE '%lue';
SELECT * FROM player_preferences
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM player_preferences WHERE player_id = 1
SELECT player_name, character_color FROM player_preferences WHERE character_color = 'Blue'
SELECT * FROM character_customization ORDER BY customization_id DESC

SELECT player_name, customization_type, customization_value FROM player_preferences JOIN player_customization ON player_preferences.player_id = player_customization.player_id JOIN character_customization ON player_customization.customization_id = character_customization.customization_id
SELECT player_name, character_color FROM player_preferences WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM character_customization ORDER BY customization_id DESC;

SELECT player_name, customization_type, customization_value FROM player_preferences JOIN player_customization ON player_preferences.player_id = player_customization.player_id JOIN character_customization ON player_customization.customization_id = character_customization.customization_id;

SELECT player_name, customization_type, customization_value FROM player_preferences JOIN player_customization ON player_preferences.player_id = player_customization.player_id JOIN character_customization ON player_customization.customization_id = character_customization.customization_id WHERE character_color = 'Red' ORDER BY player_name DESC;

SELECT player_name, character_color, customization_type FROM player_preferences JOIN player_customization ON player_preferences.player_id = player_customization.player_id JOIN character_customization ON player_customization.customization_id = character_customization.customization_id WHERE player_name LIKE '%John%' AND customization_value = 'Glasses';
SELECT * FROM PlayerPreferences;
SELECT character_name, preferred_weapon FROM PlayerPreferences;
SELECT outfit_name, armor_level FROM CharacterOutfits WHERE player_id = 1001;
SELECT player_id, hairstyle FROM CharacterCustomizations WHERE facial_hair IS NOT NULL;
SELECT background_type, background_image_url FROM CharacterBackgrounds ORDER BY background_id DESC;
SELECT player_id, character_name, favorite_color FROM PlayerPreferences;
SELECT * FROM CharacterCustomizations WHERE player_id = 101 ORDER BY hairstyle DESC;
SELECT outfit_name, armor_level FROM CharacterOutfits WHERE player_id = 201 AND armor_level > 50;
SELECT background_id, background_type, background_image_url FROM CharacterBackgrounds WHERE player_id = 301 AND background_type = 'Forest';
SELECT player_id, preferred_weapon FROM PlayerPreferences WHERE favorite_color = 'Blue' ORDER BY player_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM player_preferences;
SELECT player_id, character_name FROM player_preferences;
SELECT character_name, font_style, background_color FROM player_preferences;
SELECT option_name, option_category FROM character_options WHERE option_id = 1;
SELECT history_id, player_id, action_type, action_timestamp FROM customization_history ORDER BY action_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_preferences;
SELECT character_name, background_color FROM player_preferences WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT option_category FROM character_options ORDER BY option_category DESC;
SELECT player_id, character_id, relationship_type FROM character_relationships WHERE player_id = 5 AND relationship_type = 'Friend';
SELECT * FROM customization_history WHERE action_type = 'Update' ORDER BY action_timestamp DESC LIMIT 3;
